package: Nexus COS - Complete THIIO Handoff Package

contents.services: 52+ services (backend, AI, banking, OTT, Stream, DSP, Auth, Core)
contents.infrastructure: All Dockerfiles, K8s manifests, Docker Compose, PM2 configs
contents.banking_layer: Complete PUABO BLAC banking services and migrations
contents.scripts: Build, test, deploy, migration, and validation scripts

note: This package contains the entire Nexus COS platform stack (52+ services, 43 modules), all infrastructure, all manifests, all scripts, the banking layer, and the 23-file minimal THIIO kit. Ready for immediate deployment.
